mapper.select: select bid, cid, uid_buyer, uid_seller, price, message_buyer, reply_seller, agree, `time_created`, time_reply, nickname, avatar from db_happy_trade.t_commodity_bid, db_happy_trade.t_user where t_commodity_bid.uid_buyer = t_user.uid and t_commodity_bid.trade_id is not NULL AND t_commodity_bid.cid = #{cid} order by `time_created`
